title: Michigan state lawmaker apologizes for wearing apparent Confederate flag face mask
description: A Michigan state senator is now apologizing for wearing a face mask with what appeared to be a Confederate flag pattern.
content:
1/2:
I'm sorry for my choice of pattern on the face mask I wore yesterday on the Senate floor. I did not intend to offend anyone; however, I realize that I did, and for that I am sorry. Those who know me best know that I do not support the things this patter… [+61 chars]
